title: Concept Dependencies Graph
description: An interactive directed acyclic graph showing concept dependencies with REQUIRES (hard prerequisites) and SUPPORTS (soft prerequisites) edge types. Click nodes to highlight upstream and downstream dependencies.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Education
Instructional Design
Concept Mapping
Learning Dependencies
learningObjectives: Distinguish between hard and soft dependencies
Plan a learning path through interconnected topics
Understand how concepts build upon each other

controls.description: Click nodes to highlight upstream and downstream dependencies
Hover over nodes to see concept descriptions

controls.name: Reset View
controls.description: Clear highlighting and return to default view
Built-in vis-network navigation buttons for zoom and pan

edgeTypes.name: REQUIRES
edgeTypes.description: Hard prerequisite - concept must be learned before proceeding

edgeTypes.name: SUPPORTS
edgeTypes.description: Soft prerequisite - helpful but not strictly required
